subcategory_lists.title: Healthy Food, Nutrition and Weight loss.
subcategory_lists.description: These are companies involved in production, manufacturing or distribution of natural/ organic foods, provision of weight loss and dietary services and operation of healthy food and nutrition stores.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 자연/유기농 식품 생산/제조/유통, 체중 감량 및 식이 서비스, 건강식품 및 영양 가게 운영에 관여하는 회사들입니다.

subcategory_lists.title: Fitness and Apparel
subcategory_lists.description: Includes fitness clubs, as well as companies which are involved in the production, manufacturing or sale of sports/fitness equipment, fitness wearable technology, fitness/athletic apparel.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 피트니스 클럽, 스포츠/피트니스 장비 생산, 제조 또는 판매, 피트니스 웨어러블 기술, 운동복에 관련된 기업들 포함.

subcategory_lists.title: Nutritional Supplements and Preventive Health Care
subcategory_lists.description: These are companies involved in manufacturing or development of nutritional supplements or traditional medicines and suppliers or manufacturers of fitness trackers and preventive health monitoring devices.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 영양 보충제 및 전통 의료품 제조 또는 개발과 피트니스 트래커 및 예방 건강 모니터링 장치의 공급업체 또는 제조업체에 관여하는 기업들이다.

subcategory_lists.title: Other categories
subcategory_lists.description: These are companies engaged in the production and/or sale of anti-aging products, workplace wellness companies, spa and wellness centres, and wellness hotels.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 노화 방지 제품, 워크플레이스 웰니스 회사, 스파 및 웰니스 센터, 웰니스 호텔에 종사하는 회사들이다.
